'El Segundo' is a city in Los Angeles County, California, United States. El
Segundo, from Spanish, means 'The Second' in English. Located on the
Santa Monica Bay, it was incorporated on January 18, 1917, and is one of the
Beach Cities of Los Angeles County and part of the South Bay Cities Council of
Governments. The population was 16,654 at the 2010 census, up from 16,033 at the
2000 census.
